content:
Based on the evidence provided, the following key information can be summarized to verify the claim:

* Manchester is a major city and metropolitan borough in Greater Manchester, England.
* In 2017, Manchester had a population of 545,500.
* Manchester was the 5th most populous English district in 2017.

Therefore, the claim "Manchester had a population of more than 540,000 in 2017 and was the 5th most populous English district" is true based on the evidence provided.
